mapper.insert: insert into book (id, name, description, category, author, publisher, releaseDate, pages, unitPrice, unitInStock, imgFileName) values (#{id},#{name},#{description},#{category},#{author},#{publisher},#{releaseDate},#{pages},#{unitPrice},#{unitInStock},#{imgFileName})
mapper.update: update book set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, releaseDate = #{releaseDate}, pages = #{pages}, unitPrice = #{unitPrice}, unitInStock = #{unitInStock}, imgFileName = #{imgFileName}, createDate = #{createDate} where id = #{id}
